short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unscramble photos when browsing Crazy Blind Date

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When browsing through OkCupid's new feature "Crazy Blind Date" make sure you know what you're getting into. With Crazy Unscramble you can manually unscramble your potential date's picture.
